Translations.Text: Feria advenit when nos summon omnis community some de those non believe in noster proofs forcibly
When they arrive He dictus Vos rejected My revelations acquiring knowledge them! Hoc non quod vos est perfecit
They incur requital their wickedness; they dictus nihil
they non vide nos habuit factus nox their rest feria lighted? These est sufficient proofs people qui believe
Feria when horn blown everyone caelum terra horrified absque those chosen DEUS! Totus testimentum advenit Eum forcibly
When vos look montis vos think they standing adhuc. Autem they moving like clouds Such est manufacture DEUS perfected everything. He est fully Cognizant de everything vos perfecit
(Those bring bonus works their actum) receive far bene rewards they est perfectly secure horrors ut feria
Prout pro those bring malus works they forced Hell. Vos non requited quod vos perfecit
Ego simply commanded worship Dominus hoc oppidum! - He factus it safe sanctuary - He possesses totus things. Ego commanded est submitter
Ac to recite Quran! Whoever guided guided his suus bonus ac si they iit astray tunc dictus ego est simply warner
Dictus Praise est DEUS; He show vos His proofs dum vos recognize them! Tuus Dominus est nunquam unaware de anything vos perfecit
